column2: X-Men: The End - Men and X-Men (2006) #4
column6:
A villain revealed, an empire in turmoil, and a fateful family reunion, as the remaining X-Men cluster for their final battle--all while the votes are being tallied in Chicago...,2006,4

32 PGS./Rated T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99
